languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс долго молчит, глядя куда-то в сторону. Затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Ни один слуга Бога-Императора не имеет дела со скверной настолько близко, как агенты {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. В стремлении уберечь Империум от самых коварных и тайных происков его врагов Инквизиция стремится познать суть зла. Для нас недостаточно спалить или разрубить поганый росток — мы должны изучить его. Понять его. Прикоснуться к нему. Любой из нас рискует собственной душой, когда выполняет свой долг. Но псайкеры... душа псайкера особенно заманчива для Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс долго молчит, глядя куда-то в сторону. Затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Ни один слуга Бога-Императора не имеет дела со скверной настолько близко, как агенты {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. В стремлении уберечь Империум от самых коварных и тайных происков его врагов Инквизиция стремится познать суть зла. Для нас недостаточно спалить или разрубить поганый росток — мы должны изучить его. Понять его. Прикоснуться к нему. Любой из нас рискует собственной душой, когда выполняет свой долг. Но псайкеры... душа псайкера особенно заманчива для Архиврага".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс долго молчит, глядя куда-то в сторону. languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默了很久，眼神变得茫远。随后，他直视着你的目光。{/n}“在神皇的所有仆人之中，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人是最接近腐化的。为了保护帝国免受狡猾敌人的阴谋所害，审判庭必须了解邪恶的本质。对我们而言，仅仅烧掉或砍掉腐烂的幼苗，是远远不够的。我们必须研究它，理解它，触碰它。每当我们履行这样的职责时，我们都是在拿我们自己的灵魂冒险。而当涉及到灵能者时……对混沌大敌而言，灵能者的灵魂尤为诱人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the Golden Throne. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio por un largo tiempo con la mirada distante. Por fin, te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Ningún sirviente del Dios Emperador se aproxima tanto a la corrupción como los agentes del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. En su misión por proteger al Imperium contra las maquinaciones más retorcidas y ocultas de sus enemigos, la Inquisición trata de comprender la esencia del mal. No nos basta con quemar y destruir las manzanas podridas: debemos estudiarlas. Entenderlas. Tocarlas. Cada vez que cada uno de nosotros cumplimos con nuestro deber, ponemos en riesgo nuestras mismas almas. Pero, en cuanto a los psíquicos... sus almas son especialmente tentadoras para el Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio por un largo tiempo con la mirada distante. Por fin, te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Ningún sirviente del Dios Emperador se aproxima tanto a la corrupción como los agentes del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. En su misión por proteger al Imperium contra las maquinaciones más retorcidas y ocultas de sus enemigos, la Inquisición trata de comprender la esencia del mal. No nos basta con quemar y destruir las manzanas podridas: debemos estudiarlas. Entenderlas. Tocarlas. Cada vez que cada uno de nosotros cumplimos con nuestro deber, ponemos en riesgo nuestras mismas almas. Pero, en cuanto a los psíquicos... sus almas son especialmente tentadoras para el Archienemigo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、遠い目をしながら長い間黙っていた。それから、あなたをまっすぐに見つめた。{/n}「神帝陛下に仕える者の中で、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕える者ほど腐敗と密接な関係を持つ者はいない。異端審問庁は、敵の最も狡猾で秘密めいた陰謀から帝国を守るため、悪の本質を理解しようと努めている。腐った苗木を燃やしたり切り倒したりするだけでは十分ではないのだ。理解しなければならない。それに触れなければならない。我々の誰もが任務を遂行するたびに、魂そのものを危険にさらしているのだ。まして異能者となれば…その魂は、渾沌の勢力にとって特に魅力的なものなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、遠い目をしながら長い間黙っていた。それから、あなたをまっすぐに見つめた。{/n}「神帝陛下に仕える者の中で、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕える者ほど腐敗と密接な関係を持つ者はいない。異端審問庁は、敵の最も狡猾で秘密めいた陰謀から帝国を守るため、悪の本質を理解しようと努めている。腐った苗木を燃やしたり切り倒したりするだけでは十分ではないのだ。理解しなければならない。それに触れなければならない。我々の誰もが任務を遂行するたびに、魂そのものを危険にさらしているのだ。まして異能者となれば…その魂は、渾沌の勢力にとって特に魅力的なものなのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt lange, sein Blick ist abwesend. Dann sieht er dich an.{/n} "Kein Diener des Gottimperators kommt der Verderbtheit näher als die Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Durch ihre Bemühungen, das Imperium gegen die heimtückischsten und geheimsten Intrigen seiner Feinde zu beschützen, versucht die Inquisition auch, die Essenz des Bösen zu ergründen. Es reicht uns nicht, einen faulen Schössling niederzubrennen oder abzuschneiden — wir müssen ihn studieren. Ihn verstehen. Ihn berühren. Jedes Mal, wenn einer von uns seine Pflicht tut, riskiert er seine Seele. Doch bei Psionikern ... nun, die Seele eines Psionikers ist für den Erzfeind besonders verlockend."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt lange, sein Blick ist abwesend. Dann sieht er dich an.{/n} "Kein Diener des Gottimperators kommt der Verderbtheit näher als die Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Durch ihre Bemühungen, das Imperium gegen die heimtückischsten und geheimsten Intrigen seiner Feinde zu beschützen, versucht die Inquisition auch, die Essenz des Bösen zu ergründen. Es reicht uns nicht, einen faulen Schössling niederzubrennen oder abzuschneiden — wir müssen ihn studieren. Ihn verstehen. Ihn berühren. Jedes Mal, wenn einer von uns seine Pflicht tut, riskiert er seine Seele. Doch bei Psionikern ... nun, die Seele eines Psionikers ist für den Erzfeind besonders verlockend."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux un moment, les yeux perdus dans le vague, puis il croise votre regard.{/n} « De tous les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, les agents du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} sont ceux qui sont le plus souvent en contact avec la corruption, de par la nature même de leur travail. Dans sa volonté de protéger l'Imperium des complots les plus sournois de ses ennemis, l'Inquisition cherche à comprendre l'essence du mal. Nous ne pouvons pas nous contenter de brûler ou d'arracher un semis corrompu ; nous devons l'étudier. Le comprendre. Le toucher. Chaque fois que nous accomplissons notre devoir, nous risquons nos âmes. C'est d'autant plus risqué pour les psykers, qui sont des proies de choix pour le Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux un moment, les yeux perdus dans le vague, puis il croise votre regard.{/n} « De tous les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, les agents du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} sont ceux qui sont le plus souvent en contact avec la corruption, de par la nature même de leur travail. Dans sa volonté de protéger l'Imperium des complots les plus sournois de ses ennemis, l'Inquisition cherche à comprendre l'essence du mal. Nous ne pouvons pas nous contenter pas de brûler ou d'arracher un semis corrompu ; nous devons l'étudier. Le comprendre. Le toucher. Chaque fois que nous accomplissons notre devoir, nous risquons nos âmes. C'est d'autant plus risqué pour les psykers, qui sont des proies de choix pour le Grand Ennemi. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, uzaklara dalıp bir müddet susuyor. Ardından seninle göz göze geliyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un hiçbir hizmetkârı, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} adanmışlar kadar yozlukla haşır neşir değildir. Engizisyon, İmparatorluk düşmanlarının kurduğu en feci, en gizli tezgâhları çözmek adına kötülüğün özünü anlamaya çalışır. Çürük fideleri yakmak, kesip atmak yetmez... Tahlil etmemiz, idrak etmemiz, dokunmamız gerekir. Bu vesileyle de her birimizin ruhu tehlikededir. Bir de ruhsezer olunca... Ruhsezer ruhları, Şerbaşı'na daha bir cazip gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a long time, his eyes distant. Then he meets your gaze.{/n} "No servant of the God-Emperor has closer dealings with corruption than the agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. In its quest to guard the Imperium against its foes' most devious and secret schemes, the Inquisition seeks to understand the essence of evil. It is not enough for us to burn or cut down a rotten seedling — we must study it. Understand it. Touch it. Every time any of us do our duty, we are risking our very souls. But when it comes to psykers... the soul of a psyker is especially enticing to the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, uzaklara dalıp bir müddet susuyor. Ardından seninle göz göze geliyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un hiçbir hizmetkârı yoktur ki {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'a adanmışlar kadar yozlukla haşır neşir olsun. Engizisyon, İmparatorluk düşmanlarının kurduğu en feci, en gizli tezgâhları çözmek adına kötülüğün özünü anlamaya çalışır. Çürük fideleri yakmak, kesip atmak yetmez... Tahlil etmemiz gerekir. İdrak etmemiz gerekir. Dokunmamız gerekir. Bu vesileyle de her birimizin ruhu tehlikededir. Bir de ruhsezer olunca... Ruhsezer ruhları, Şerbaşı'na daha bir caziptir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
